CmdLine: apt-get update     && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends        software-properties-common        python-software-properties     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*     && rm -Rf /usr/share/doc && rm -Rf /usr/share/man     && apt-get clean
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: apt-add-repository -y ppa:ansible/ansible     && apt-get update     && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends        ansible     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*     && rm -Rf /usr/share/doc && rm -Rf /usr/share/man     && touch -m -t 200101010101.01 /var/lib/apt/periodic/update-success-stamp     && apt-get clean
Commands.Name: run
